body:

```
} catch (RuntimeException e)
```

(As per the style guide:
https://google.github.io/styleguide/javaguide.html#s4.1.2-blocks-k-r-style)

Though, if you want, ignore this and I can just fix up these formatting nits before merging and you don't have to spend your time learning our style guide :)
